amendment.description: Amendment transfers $1 million from the IRS enforcement division to the IRS Office of the Inspector General.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for salaries and expenses for administration under Treasury Inspector General for Tax by $1 million and to reduce funding for Enforcement at IRS by a similar amount.
